snippet: A former trooper of the year with the Utah Highway Patrol is accused of falsifying dozens of arrests on charges of driving under the influence during her 10-year career.
abstract: Lawsuit against former Utah Highway Patrol trooper Lisa Steed accuses her of falsifying dozens of driving-under-the-influence arrests during her 10-year career; Steed, named 2007 trooper of the year by her superiors, is appealing her dismissal.
lead_paragraph: A former trooper of the year with the Utah Highway Patrol is accused of falsifying dozens of arrests on charges of driving under the influence during her 10-year career.

headline.seo: Lawsuit Accuses Fired Utah Trooper of Falsifying D.U.I. Arrests
headline.main: Suit Claims Officer Faked D.U.I. Cases
headline.print_headline: Suit Claims Officer Faked D.U.I. Cases
